## Solution

This task is considered to be finished when the chunk below is producing meaningful output

```{sql connection=con}
SELECT 
  h.hobo_id,
  min(tstamp) AS "start",
  max(tstamp) AS "end",
  count(*) AS "count"
FROM quality_checked q
JOIN hobos h ON h.hobo_id=q.hobo_id
WHERE h.year = 2020
GROUP BY h.hobo_id
```
